trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_SEQ_00<tab>Nigen's brother should have returned from his errand by now.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_TODO_00<tab>Find Nigen's brother and slay any enemies that appear.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_000<tab>Hello there, adventurer. There is something I would ask of you if you have the time.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_001<tab>My brother spoke with the udgan for the first time today. The elder gods declared that he must collect his own weight in grass from the field to the southwest.

TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_002<tab>However, that field is home to many a deadly beast. I want nothing more than to check on his safety, but the gods have said I must cook our family's meals today.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_003<tab>My brother should still be gathering grass to the southwest. Please, go and check on him for me.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_004<tab>My brother should still be gathering grass to the southwest. Please, go and check on him for me.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGENBROTHER02766_000_010<tab>Th-Thank you. I only let my guard down for a moment, but it was more than enough time for those creatures to attack.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGENBROTHER02766_000_011<tab>You do not need to accompany me the rest of the way. It is time I proved myself strong enough to carry out what the gods ask of me on my own.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_020<tab>Did you find my brother? He is still yet to return.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_030<tab>Thank you for your help. My brother is returned at last.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_031<tab>We Mol consider the elder gods' orders to be absolute. We must follow them even if it means endangering our lives.
TEXT_STMBDZ515_02766_NIGEN_000_032<tab>This is a small token of thanks from my brother and I.
